backend/main.mo: Main canister with access control, admin management, user profiles, and ticket/contact form handling.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old orders to new format by adding customer fields and cleaning type defaults.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of summarized descriptions for various frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color tokens, dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component composing site sections and conditionally rendering the admin panel via AdminGateProvider.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI component displaying access-denied messages with login or retry options depending on authentication.
frontend/src/components/AdminOrderManage: Admin panel component handling order creation, status updates, order listing, admin checks, and initialization logic.
frontend/src/components/AdminOrderTracki: Admin UI for searching a tracking code and updating package status, restoration steps, and shipping state.
frontend/src/components/AdminPasswordPro: Password modal that validates a fixed admin password and unlocks the admin panel with optional scrolling behavior.
frontend/src/components/AdminPrincipalMa: Interface for adding new admin principals and listing current admin IDs with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/AdminQuoteFormsS: Admin dashboard for viewing submitted quote tickets, toggling completion status, and opening full message details.
frontend/src/components/ContactFormSecti: Public contact form that submits name, email, and message, with validation and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/FullTicketMessag: Modal that displays the full contents of a ticket message including customer info, category, and message body.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Landing hero component with background image, headline, feature highlights, and buttons that smooth-scroll to contact and tracking sections.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button that manages Internet Identity authentication state with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ServiceTiersSect: Pricing section displaying three service tiers with features, styling, and a button that scrolls to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with brand info, quick navigation links, social icons, and admin access handling with smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky header with navigation, mobile menu, brand logo, admin gating, and scroll-based UI behavior.
frontend/src/components/TrackPackageSect: Package tracking UI allowing users to enter a tracking code, view status, progress, and detailed restoration steps.
frontend/src/context/AdminGateContext.ts: Context provider managing admin unlock state and prompt visibility with helper methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor using the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: Returns an admin-capable backend actor tied to the current identity without secret initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAllowlistQuer: Provides queries and mutations for reading and updating the admin principal allowlist.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminDiagnostics.t: Fetches backend initialization and admin diagnostic status using the admin actor.
Supports creating, updating, and retrieving orders with admin authorization checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminTicketQueries: Provides admin queries and mutations for listing tickets and updating ticket completion status.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminTrackingManag: Admin utilities for viewing tracking state and updating package and restoration step statuses.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login, logout, and identity persistence via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Submits contact forms through the actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrackingQueries.ts: Retrieves tracking state and order status for a tracking code, handling missing data gracefully.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and theme CSS variables for light/dark modes plus utility classes like text-balance and logo-square.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Builds asset URLs using BASE_URL, normalizing slashes for correct static asset loading.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/orderStatusLabel.ts: Maps OrderStatus enum values to human‑readable status labels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, radius, shadows, plugins, and OKLCH‑based theme variables.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, current features, and pending requests related to adding customer details and cleaning type to orders.
